episodes.title: Watchtower's Unusual Method of Communication in Study Article 4 #Watchtower, #JehovahWitness, #exjw
episodes.description:
Hi friends. I wanted to share an unusual pattern of communication that I noticed in Study Article 4. If most Witnesses took the time to look up the scriptures that are cited in the magazines, they might have noticed it as well. Thanks for watching!

episodes.title: Watchtower Has Done it Again!
episodes.description:
Hi Friends. Watchtower is claiming new light once again! Let's explore the April 2020 Watchtower to see what it is all about and then grab our bibles to see if it all lines up! This is a great one that you cannot miss! 
#watchtower, #JehovahsWitnesses, #NewLight

episodes.title: Ex JW explains how "the truth" could not stand up to The TRUTH
episodes.description: As a Jehovah's Witness, I believed being in the organization meant that I was in "the truth". But when I escaped, I soon found out that it was just a bunch of lies. #jehovahswitnesses, #exjw, #jehovahwitness, #thetruth,
